lookup

public <T> java.util.Iterator<T> lookup(java.lang.Class<? extends T> type,
                                        java.lang.String filter)
Uses a timed cache to decide when to delegate to the underlying registry. Lookup service instances from registry, constrained by LDAP filter.

Specified by:
lookup in interface ServiceRegistry
Parameters:
type - expected service class
